metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25435 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: libtiff 4.5.0 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow via extractContigSamplesShifted8bits() at /libtiff/tools/tiffcrop.c:3753.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> invalid read, DoS only ccdm94> same fix as the one for CVE-2023-25434, which is also the same fix as the one for CVE-2023-0795.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
